name: Pong Remake (Torden)
description:
Remake of Pong made in Godot Engine. Make as many critical comments about the game as you want, every help is needed.
You can Download the Game if you don't like playing it on the browser.
If you use Godot engine and you want to take a look at the source code i provided it among the downloadable files.

If the MacOS or Linux versions don't works write a comment and, if you can, suggest how can i make them work, because i can't manage to test these versions.

Simple remake of Pong. Made for educational purpose.

Have Fun!

KEY CONTROLS
w = up movement for the left player
s = down movement for the right player
space = shoot the ball for both players
up_arrow = up movement for the right player
down_arrow = down movement for the right player
